name: Infinite Desolation
description:
INTRODUCTION
Infinite Desolation is a fusion of intense top-down action and survival role-playing, set on a harsh planet where your physical and mental attributes will be tested to their limits. To stay alive, you will pit yourself against hordes of alien wildlife, robotic enemies, and an intensely hostile environment. If you survive, you will slowly build up an arsenal of weapons and special abilities by leveling up and exploring the world.


Infinite Desolation is much more than a simple action game. Delve into the epic universe we’re creating and discover deep character progression, exploration and looting, crafting, day/night cycles, environmental hazards, classic survival mechanics and world-jumping portals. You will be blown away by the depth of Infinite Desolation... if you aren’t blown away by your enemies first.FEATURES
Character Creation -
Choose from one of 5 classes: Grunt, Psion, Scout, Engineer or Marine. Define your custom character using S.P.A.C.E: Strength, Psi, Agility, Cunning and Endurance.

Survive -
Explore dangerous environments to find Oxygen, Water, health packs, safe havens, and other gear.

Craft & Scavenge -
Find crafting materials in old wreckage. Create items such as Water Extractors, Oxygen Extractors, and even Drones to fight by your side.

Day/Night -
Rest at night in safe havens to restore health, or just explore at night when the temperature is cooler. Your hydration levels will deplete more slowly, but nighttime can be dangerous.

Psi Abilities -
Unlock and upgrade powerful abilities such as Heal, Blink, Sprint and Repulse.
Higher level abilities can dish out massive damage. For example, leave a fire trail when you activate Speed Level 2.

Weapons -
Collect unique weapons, ranging from the versatile M7 Fury plasma rifle to the truly devastating R-G Launcher.

Interact -
Find Power Cores to power up and interact with all sorts of devices: extend bridges, power up outposts, activate teleporters, and more.

Intense Battles -
At its heart, this is a top-down horde rush shooter. You will engage in intense battles, blow up enemies by setting off explosive barrels, activate defense turrets to help you thin the crowd, plough through enemies using your upgraded Psi Abilities, or launch flurries of rockets into the horde. You have many ways to beat down your foe.Co-Op ModesSpeedrun Mode - Battle through waves of enemies to reach the end of the Speedrun course in record time.

Doomed Mode - Play as a standard character with upgraded abilities as you battle to reach the top of the online scoreboard. Destroy enemies in large numbers to push up your score multiplier. Keep moving to find oxygen, weapons, health and ammo. These high intensity rounds last about 5 minutes, but they will test your skills to the limit.

Mission Mode - Co-operate with a friend to complete a set of objectives while surviving the environment and battling enemy hordes.Versus ModeGo head to head against friends in 4-player free-for-all deathmatch mode. Crush your enemies to claim victory by being the first to reach the kill limit.
